trans-unit.target: 다른 열에 상대적인 열의 표시 위치를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The DisplayIndex property has a default value of -1 before it is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: DisplayIndex 속성은 기본값이-1에 추가 되기 전에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName>컬렉션.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This value is updated when the column is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.
trans-unit.target: 이 값은 열 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> 에 추가 될 때 업데이트

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> requires that the DisplayIndex property of each column must be a unique integer from 0 to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinitionCollection.Count%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> -1.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>있어야 각 열의 DisplayIndex 속성은 0에서 고유한 정수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinitionCollection.Count%2A>의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>-1.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinitionCollection.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when the DisplayIndex of one column changes, the change typically causes the DisplayIndex of other columns to also change.
trans-unit.target: 따라서 한 열의 DisplayIndex 변경 될 때 변경 변경할 다른 열의 DisplayIndex 일반적으로 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The restrictions on the DisplayIndex value are enforced by a <xref:System.Windows.ValidateValueCallback> mechanism.
trans-unit.target: DisplayIndex 값에 대 한 제한에 의해 적용 되는 <xref:System.Windows.ValidateValueCallback>메커니즘.</xref:System.Windows.ValidateValueCallback>

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to set a value that is not valid, a run-time exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 유효 하지 않은 값을 설정 하려고 하면 런타임 예외가 throw 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: When the value of the DisplayIndex property is changed, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.ColumnDisplayIndexChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: DisplayIndex 속성의 값이 변경 되 면는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.ColumnDisplayIndexChanged?displayProperty=fullName>이벤트가 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.ColumnDisplayIndexChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position of the column, as it is displayed in the associated <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 그대로 열의&0;부터 시작 위치에 표시 되는 연결 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The registered default is -1.
trans-unit.target: 등록 된 기본값은-1입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style object to apply to the column header during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: 끌기 작업 중 열 머리글에 적용할 스타일 개체를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to set the DragIndicatorStyle for an individual column in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 사용 하 여 개별 열에 대 한 DragIndicatorStyle <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> 설정 하려면

trans-unit.source: To define a <xref:System.Windows.Style> for the drag indicator, specify a <xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Style>끌기 표시기는 <xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>안내 하십시오.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control> </xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A> 지정</xref:System.Windows.Style> 을 정의 하려면

trans-unit.source: You can set properties in the style to change the appearance of certain elements of the drag indicator, such as the border around the column header.
trans-unit.target: 끌기 표시기 열 머리글의 테두리 등의 특정 요소의 모양을 변경 하는 스타일의 속성을 설정할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: However, the default template for the drag indicator uses a <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush> to paint a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas> with an image of the original column header that is being dragged.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 끌기 표시기에 대 한 기본 템플릿을 사용 하 여 한 <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>그리는 데는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>끌고 있는 원래 열 머리글의 이미지와 함께.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas> </xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>

trans-unit.source: As a result, if you set some properties in your style, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Foreground%2A>, they will appear to not be applied.
trans-unit.target: 와 같은 스타일에서 일부 속성을 설정 하는 경우 결과적으로 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Foreground%2A>, 적용 하지에 표시 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Foreground%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A>

trans-unit.source: To change the appearance of the column header while it is being dragged, apply a new template that does not use the default <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>.
trans-unit.target: 열 머리글의 모양은 끄는 동안를 변경 하려면 <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush> 기본값을 사용 하지 않는 새 템플릿을 적용합니다

trans-unit.target: 끌기 작업 중 열 머리글에 적용할 스타일 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called for each selected cell to retrieve the default cell content.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength.DisplayValue%2A> of the Width property is constrained by the following properties, if they are set, in order of precedence: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.MaxWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.MaxColumnWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.MinWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.MinColumnWidth%2A?displayProperty=fullName>
